name: Bird Management (Prototype)
description:
In this virtual pet simulator, you'll help cute anthro birds fulfill their needs. They'll need food, rest, cuddle time and regular baths to be at their best.

Controls

drag and drop birds - tap and hold (or hold left click)
(be patient, sometimes lags)

see bird stats - tap (or tap left click)

Overview

This game is meant to be pretty small, but I wanted to see what I could create with a smaller conceptual scope. Nothing much more.

Hopefully now that it's published I'll be inclined to make a few improvements to the mobile experience and general polish. 😅
